abstract: 无论是全国卷还是各省区市试卷,高考化学试题都需要以高考评价体系立意,确保试题“一核”功能的有效发挥。从三个层面剖析了高考试题引导教学的维度与取向。以2024年高考新课标卷化学试题为例,详细阐述了高考评价体系立意的高考试题如何实现考查内容与学业质量标准的一致性,考查要求与课程目标追求的一致性,价值引领与综合素养体现的一致性,为各省区市命制高考化学试题提供借鉴和启示。
ZH_EN: Whether it's the national exam or the test papers from various provinces and cities, the chemistry questions in the college entrance examination need to be based on the evaluation system of the college entrance examination to ensure the effective function of the "core" of the questions. It analyzes the dimensions and orientations of how college entrance examination questions guide teaching from three levels. Taking the 2024 new curriculum standard chemistry exam questions as an example, it elaborates in detail how the questions, based on the college entrance examination evaluation system, achieve consistency in examination content with academic quality standards, consistency in examination requirements with course objectives, and consistency in value guidance with the demonstration of comprehensive qualities, providing references and insights for the formulation of chemistry questions in various provinces and cities.
EN_ZH: 无论是全国卷还是各省市的试卷，高考中的化学题都需要基于高考评价体系来确保题目的“核心”功能的有效发挥。从三个层面分析高考题目引导教学的维度和方向。以2024年新课标化学试题为例，详细阐述了题目如何基于高考评价体系，实现考试内容与学业质量标准的一致性，考试要求与课程目标的一致性，以及价值引导与综合素质展示的一致性，为各省市化学题目的命制提供参考和启示。

abstract: 无论是全国卷还是各省区市试卷,高考化学试题都需要以高考评价体系立意,确保试题“一核”功能的有效发挥。从三个层面剖析了高考试题引导教学的维度与取向。以2024年高考新课标卷化学试题为例,详细阐述了高考评价体系立意的高考试题如何实现考查内容与学业质量标准的一致性,考查要求与课程目标追求的一致性,价值引领与综合素养体现的一致性,为各省区市命制高考化学试题提供借鉴和启示。
ZH_EN: Whether it's the national college entrance examination papers or the papers from various provinces, municipalities, and regions, the chemistry questions for the college entrance examination need to be based on the evaluation system of the college entrance exam to ensure the effective implementation of the core functions of the exam. The paper dissects the dimensions and orientations of the college entrance examination questions in guiding teaching from three levels. Taking the new curriculum standards chemistry exam papers for the 2024 college entrance examination as an example, it elaborately explains how the exam questions based on the evaluation system achieve consistency between the examination content and academic quality standards, the alignment between examination requirements and course objectives, and the consistency in value guidance and the manifestation of comprehensive literacy, providing references and insights for the formulation of chemistry exam papers in various provinces, municipalities, and regions.
EN_ZH: 无论是全国高考试卷还是各省市自治区的试卷，高考化学试题都需要基于高考评价体系来设计，以确保考试的核心功能得以有效实施。试卷从三个层面剖析高考试题在引导教学中的维度和方向。以2024年新课程标准高考化学试卷为例，详细阐述了基于评价体系的试题如何实现考试内容与学业质量标准的一致性、考试要求与课程目标的对接、价值引导与综合素养的体现，为各省市自治区化学试卷的命制提供参考和启示。

abstract: 无论是全国卷还是各省区市试卷,高考化学试题都需要以高考评价体系立意,确保试题“一核”功能的有效发挥。从三个层面剖析了高考试题引导教学的维度与取向。以2024年高考新课标卷化学试题为例,详细阐述了高考评价体系立意的高考试题如何实现考查内容与学业质量标准的一致性,考查要求与课程目标追求的一致性,价值引领与综合素养体现的一致性,为各省区市命制高考化学试题提供借鉴和启示。
ZH_EN: Whether it is the national college entrance examination papers or those from various provinces, municipalities, and autonomous regions, the chemistry exam questions must be aligned with the evaluation system of the college entrance examination to ensure the effective implementation of the core function of the exam questions. The dimensions and orientations of how college entrance examination questions guide teaching are analyzed from three levels. Taking the 2024 new curriculum standard chemistry exam questions as an example, this paper elaborately explains how college entrance examination questions based on the evaluation system ensure consistency between the examination content and academic quality standards, between the examination requirements and curriculum objectives, and between value guidance and the demonstration of comprehensive literacy, providing reference and inspiration for formulating chemistry exam questions in various provinces, municipalities, and autonomous regions.
EN_ZH: 无论是国家高考试卷还是各省、市、自治区的试卷，化学试题都必须与高考评价体系相契合，以确保试题核心功能的有效实施。高考试题对教学的引导维度和方向从三个层次进行分析。以2024年新课标化学试题为例，本文详细阐述了基于评价体系的高考试题如何确保考试内容与学业质量标准的一致性、考试要求与课程目标的一致性，以及价值引导与综合素养展示的一致性，为各省、市、自治区制定化学试题提供参考和启示。

abstract: 随着中职教育的不断发展，新型的教学方式在实际教学中的作用越来越显著。对于中职化学教学，基于微课的翻转课堂教学模式应用，不仅改变了中职化学的教学思路和组织模式，而且大大提升了化学教学的效率，在促进学科教学质量提升和学生综合能力培养方面发挥着重要作用。本文对基于微课的翻转课堂模式在中职化学教学活动的应用进行了初步分析，以期对新时期中职化学教学改革和优化提供一定参考。
ZH_EN: With the continuous development of secondary vocational education, the role of new teaching methods in practical teaching is becoming increasingly significant. For secondary vocational chemistry education, the application of the flipped classroom model based on micro-lectures not only changes the teaching approach and organizational model of chemistry education but also significantly enhances the efficiency of chemistry teaching. It plays a crucial role in improving the quality of subject teaching and fostering students' comprehensive abilities. This paper conducts a preliminary analysis of the application of the micro-lecture-based flipped classroom model in secondary vocational chemistry teaching activities, aiming to provide some reference for the reform and optimization of secondary vocational chemistry education in the new era.
EN_ZH: 随着中等职业教育的不断发展，新型教学方法在实践教学中的作用日益显著。对于中职化学教育而言，基于微课的翻转课堂模式的应用不仅改变了化学教育的教学方式和组织模式，还显著提高了化学教学的效率。它在提升学科教学质量和培养学生综合能力方面发挥着关键作用。本文对基于微课的翻转课堂模式在中职化学教学活动中的应用进行了初步分析，旨在为新时代中职化学教育的改革和优化提供一些参考。

abstract: 随着中职教育的不断发展，新型的教学方式在实际教学中的作用越来越显著。对于中职化学教学，基于微课的翻转课堂教学模式应用，不仅改变了中职化学的教学思路和组织模式，而且大大提升了化学教学的效率，在促进学科教学质量提升和学生综合能力培养方面发挥着重要作用。本文对基于微课的翻转课堂模式在中职化学教学活动的应用进行了初步分析，以期对新时期中职化学教学改革和优化提供一定参考。
ZH_EN: With the continuous development of secondary vocational education, new teaching methods are playing an increasingly significant role in actual teaching. It plays a crucial role in improving the quality of subject teaching and fostering students' comprehensive abilities. This paper conducts a preliminary analysis of the application of the micro-lecture-based flipped classroom model in secondary vocational chemistry teaching activities, aiming to provide some reference for the reform and optimization of chemistry education in the new era.

abstract: 在传统的初中化学复习教学活动中，教师很难将碎片化的知识进行充分整理，学生学习能力和综合素质的提高均受到较大影响。然而，游戏式教学法能够以鲜明的教学主题为核心，有效整合初中化学知识，从而形成更具系统性与结构性的知识框架，避免教学内容始终停留在浅层阶段。本文简要阐述初中化学复习教学中存在的问题，提出以游戏教学法对化学符号的知识进行复习教学的策略。
ZH_EN: In traditional junior high school chemistry review classes, it is challenging for teachers to fully organize fragmented knowledge, which significantly impacts students' learning abilities and overall quality. However, game-based teaching methods can effectively integrate junior high school chemistry knowledge around a clear teaching theme, forming a more systematic and structured knowledge framework, preventing the teaching content from remaining at a superficial level. This paper briefly outlines the issues in junior high school chemistry review teaching and proposes strategies for reviewing chemical symbols using game-based teaching methods.
EN_ZH: 在传统的初中化学复习课上，老师很难将零散的知识点系统化，这对学生的学习能力和整体素质有显著影响。然而，基于游戏的教学方法可以有效地围绕明确的教学主题整合初中化学知识，形成更加系统和结构化的知识框架，避免教学内容停留在表面层次。本文简要概述了初中化学复习教学中存在的问题，并提出利用游戏化教学方法复习化学符号的策略。

abstract: 在传统的初中化学复习教学活动中，教师很难将碎片化的知识进行充分整理，学生学习能力和综合素质的提高均受到较大影响。然而，游戏式教学法能够以鲜明的教学主题为核心，有效整合初中化学知识，从而形成更具系统性与结构性的知识框架，避免教学内容始终停留在浅层阶段。本文简要阐述初中化学复习教学中存在的问题，提出以游戏教学法对化学符号的知识进行复习教学的策略。
ZH_EN: In traditional junior high school chemistry review classes, teachers find it challenging to thoroughly organize fragmented knowledge, which significantly affects students' learning abilities and overall quality. However, game-based teaching methods can focus on a clear teaching theme, effectively integrating junior high school chemistry knowledge to form a more systematic and structured knowledge framework, preventing the teaching content from remaining superficial. This article briefly discusses the issues in junior high school chemistry review teaching and proposes strategies for reviewing chemical symbols using game-based teaching methods.
EN_ZH: 在传统的初中化学复习课中，教师发现很难全面整理零散的知识，这显著影响了学生的学习能力和整体素质。然而，基于游戏的教学方法可以集中在一个明确的教学主题上，有效地整合初中化学的知识，形成更系统、结构化的知识框架，避免教学内容流于表面。本文简要讨论了初中化学复习教学中的问题，并提出利用游戏化教学方法复习化学符号的策略。

abstract: 在传统的初中化学复习教学活动中，教师很难将碎片化的知识进行充分整理，学生学习能力和综合素质的提高均受到较大影响。然而，游戏式教学法能够以鲜明的教学主题为核心，有效整合初中化学知识，从而形成更具系统性与结构性的知识框架，避免教学内容始终停留在浅层阶段。本文简要阐述初中化学复习教学中存在的问题，提出以游戏教学法对化学符号的知识进行复习教学的策略。
ZH_EN: In traditional junior high school chemistry review classes, teachers find it challenging to thoroughly organize fragmented knowledge, which significantly impacts students' learning abilities and overall quality. However, game-based teaching methods can focus on vivid teaching themes to effectively integrate junior high chemistry knowledge, thereby creating a more systematic and structured knowledge framework, preventing the teaching content from remaining superficial. This article briefly discusses the issues present in junior high school chemistry review teaching and proposes strategies for reviewing chemical symbols through game-based teaching methods.
EN_ZH: 在传统的初中化学复习课上，教师们发现很难系统地整理零碎的知识，这对学生的学习能力和整体素质有显著影响。然而，基于游戏的教学方法可以专注于生动的教学主题，有效地整合初中化学的知识，从而构建一个更加系统和结构化的知识框架，防止教学内容停留在表面。本文简要讨论了初中化学复习教学中存在的问题，并提出通过游戏化教学方法来复习化学符号的策略。

abstract: 针对近年来矿业开发活动对地球的影响持续增加，当前找矿工作难度加大等问题，本研究探讨了基于矿山地质发掘的地球物理化学联合勘查新技术的应用。利用高精度、高效率、低成本的地球物理化学联合勘探方法，研究了地球化学异常的特征，挖掘了地质找矿的潜在规律，并以此指导矿山的寻找和发掘。研究结果显示，这套落地化的勘探方法在提高找矿效率、降低勘查成本与环境破坏上具有显著效果。对于矿山地质资源的研究和找矿工作，提供了新的视角和工具。
ZH_EN: In response to the increasing impact of mining activities on the Earth in recent years and the growing difficulty in mineral exploration, this study explores the application of new geophysical and geochemical joint exploration technologies based on mine geological excavation. By employing high-precision, high-efficiency, and low-cost geophysical and geochemical joint exploration methods, the characteristics of geochemical anomalies were studied, potential patterns in mineral exploration were unearthed, and these were used to guide the search and excavation of mines. The results show that this localized exploration method significantly enhances exploration efficiency, reduces exploration costs, and minimizes environmental damage. It provides a new perspective and tool for the study of mine geological resources and mineral exploration.
EN_ZH: 鉴于近年来采矿活动对地球的影响日益增加以及矿产勘探难度的增大，本研究探索了基于矿山地质挖掘的新型地球物理和地球化学联合勘探技术的应用。通过采用高精度、高效率、低成本的地球物理和地球化学联合勘探方法，研究了地球化学异常的特征，挖掘了矿产勘探的潜在模式，并用这些模式指导矿山的搜索和挖掘。结果显示，这种本地化勘探方法显著提高了勘探效率，降低了勘探成本，并减少了环境破坏。它为矿山地质资源和矿产勘探的研究提供了新的视角和工具。

abstract: 针对近年来矿业开发活动对地球的影响持续增加，当前找矿工作难度加大等问题，本研究探讨了基于矿山地质发掘的地球物理化学联合勘查新技术的应用。利用高精度、高效率、低成本的地球物理化学联合勘探方法，研究了地球化学异常的特征，挖掘了地质找矿的潜在规律，并以此指导矿山的寻找和发掘。研究结果显示，这套落地化的勘探方法在提高找矿效率、降低勘查成本与环境破坏上具有显著效果。对于矿山地质资源的研究和找矿工作，提供了新的视角和工具。
ZH_EN: In response to the increasing impact of mining activities on the Earth in recent years and the growing difficulty in mineral exploration, this study explores the application of new technologies for integrated geophysical and geochemical prospecting based on geological excavation in mines. Using high-precision, high-efficiency, and low-cost integrated geophysical and geochemical exploration methods, we investigated the characteristics of geochemical anomalies, unearthed potential patterns in mineral exploration, and used these to guide the search and excavation of mines. The results show that this localized exploration method significantly enhances exploration efficiency, reduces exploration costs, and minimizes environmental damage. It provides a new perspective and tools for the study of mining geological resources and mineral exploration.
EN_ZH: 鉴于近年来采矿活动对地球的影响日益增加以及矿物勘探的难度不断加大，本研究探讨了基于地质挖掘的矿山综合地球物理和地球化学勘探新技术的应用。利用高精度、高效率、低成本的综合地球物理和地球化学勘探方法，我们研究了地球化学异常特征，发掘了矿物勘探中的潜在模式，并利用这些模式指导矿山的搜索和挖掘。结果表明，这种局部勘探方法显著提高了勘探效率，降低了勘探成本，并减少了环境破坏。它为矿产地质资源研究和矿物勘探提供了新的视角和工具。

abstract: 针对近年来矿业开发活动对地球的影响持续增加，当前找矿工作难度加大等问题，本研究探讨了基于矿山地质发掘的地球物理化学联合勘查新技术的应用。利用高精度、高效率、低成本的地球物理化学联合勘探方法，研究了地球化学异常的特征，挖掘了地质找矿的潜在规律，并以此指导矿山的寻找和发掘。研究结果显示，这套落地化的勘探方法在提高找矿效率、降低勘查成本与环境破坏上具有显著效果。对于矿山地质资源的研究和找矿工作，提供了新的视角和工具。
ZH_EN: In response to the increasing impact of mining activities on Earth and the growing difficulty of mineral exploration in recent years, this study explores the application of new geophysical and geochemical integrated exploration technologies based on mining geological excavation. By employing high-precision, high-efficiency, and low-cost geophysical and geochemical joint exploration methods, the characteristics of geochemical anomalies were studied, and the potential patterns of geological prospecting were uncovered, guiding the search and excavation of mines. EN_ZH: 针对近年来采矿活动对地球影响的增加以及矿产勘探难度的加大，本研究探讨了基于矿业地质开挖的新型地球物理和地球化学综合勘探技术的应用。通过采用高精度、高效率、低成本的地球物理和地球化学联合勘探方法，研究了地球化学异常特征，并揭示了地质勘探的潜在模式，指导矿产的搜索与开采。结果表明，这种地面勘探方法显著提高了勘探效率，降低了勘探成本，并减少了环境破坏。它为矿业地质资源和矿产勘探工作提供了新的视角和工具。

abstract: <正>大学生思想政治教育对化学专业就业的影响是一个重要的研究课题。在现代教育中，思想政治教育不仅关乎学生的品德发展，还能在就业竞争中发挥潜在的优势。特别是化学专业，学生除了需要具备扎实的专业知识，还需要具备强烈的社会责任感、创新精神和职业道德。这些正是思想政治教育能够影响的关键因素。通过加强思想政治教育，学生能够更好地理解国家战略需求、环境保护的重要性以及创新驱动发展的必要性，从而在未来的就业市场中拥有更为突出的竞争力。
ZH_EN: The influence of ideological and political education on the employment of chemistry majors is an important research topic. In modern education, ideological and political education not only concerns the moral development of students but also provides potential advantages in the job market. Especially for chemistry majors, students need not only solid professional knowledge but also a strong sense of social responsibility, innovation, and professional ethics. These are key factors that ideological and political education can influence. By strengthening ideological and political education, students can better understand national strategic needs, the importance of environmental protection, and the necessity of innovation-driven development, thereby gaining a more prominent competitive edge in the future job market.

EN_ZH: 意识形态和政治教育对化学专业学生就业的影响是一个重要的研究课题。在现代教育中，思想政治教育不仅关系到学生的道德发展，而且在就业市场上提供潜在的优势。特别是对于化学专业的学生，除了拥有扎实的专业知识外，还需要有强烈的社会责任感、创新精神和职业道德。这些都是思想政治教育可以影响的关键因素。通过加强思想政治教育，学生能够更好地理解国家战略需求、环境保护的重要性以及创新驱动发展的必要性，从而在未来的就业市场中获得更突出的竞争优势。

abstract: 通过对山西代县阳明堡一带地热田流体化学组分特征及其动态变化和同位素地球化学特征分析研究，全面总结了地热田流体地球化学特征，发现地下热水中所含阳离子以Na+为主，阴离子以Cl-和SO42-为主，热水属弱碱、软水温热水，氟含量达到命名矿泉水浓度，可命名为氟水，具有良好的医疗保健作用，适于洗浴和医疗用水。并在此基础上，对地热田成因进行分析探讨，发现地热田形成距今1.80—1.53万年，热水补给高程大于2000 m，补给来源为恒山区域，水化学类型与大营热矿水类型相似，为理疗热矿水类型，属氟水。
ZH_EN: By analyzing the chemical composition characteristics, dynamic changes, and isotopic geochemical features of geothermal fluids in the Yangmingbao area of Dai County, Shanxi, a comprehensive summary of the geochemical characteristics of the geothermal field fluids was achieved. It was found that the cations in the geothermal water are mainly Na+, while the anions are primarily Cl- and SO42-. The thermal water is weakly alkaline, soft, and warm, with fluoride content reaching the concentration of named mineral water, thus it can be named fluoride water. It has good medicinal and health benefits, suitable for bathing and medical use. On this basis, the genesis of the geothermal field was analyzed, revealing that the geothermal field formed between 18,000 to 15,300 years ago, with a recharge altitude greater than 2000 meters, sourced from the Hengshan region. The water chemistry type is similar to that of the Daying thermal mineral water, classified as therapeutic thermal mineral water, specifically fluoride water.
EN_ZH: 通过分析山西代县阳明堡地区地热流体的化学成分特征、动态变化及同位素地球化学特征，综合总结了地热田流体的地球化学特征。发现地热水中的阳离子主要为Na+，阴离子主要为Cl-和SO42-。该热水呈弱碱性，柔和温暖，氟含量达到命名矿泉水的浓度，因此可命名为氟水。具有良好的药用和保健效益，适用于沐浴和医疗用途。在此基础上，分析了地热田的成因，发现地热田形成于18000至15300年前，补给高度大于2000米，源自恒山地区。其水化学类型与大营温泉矿泉水相似，归类为治疗性温泉矿泉水，具体为氟水。

abstract: 通过对山西代县阳明堡一带地热田流体化学组分特征及其动态变化和同位素地球化学特征分析研究，全面总结了地热田流体地球化学特征，发现地下热水中所含阳离子以Na+为主，阴离子以Cl-和SO42-为主，热水属弱碱、软水温热水，氟含量达到命名矿泉水浓度，可命名为氟水，具有良好的医疗保健作用，适于洗浴和医疗用水。并在此基础上，对地热田成因进行分析探讨，发现地热田形成距今1.80—1.53万年，热水补给高程大于2000 m，补给来源为恒山区域，水化学类型与大营热矿水类型相似，为理疗热矿水类型，属氟水。
ZH_EN: Through the analysis of the chemical composition characteristics and dynamic changes of geothermal fluids in the Yangmingbao area of Daixian County, Shanxi, along with isotopic geochemical characteristics, a comprehensive summary of the geochemical features of geothermal fluids was made. It was found that the cations in the underground hot water are mainly Na+, while the anions are primarily Cl- and SO4^2-, with the hot water being weakly alkaline, soft, and warm. The fluoride content reaches the concentration for naming mineral spring water, hence it can be named as fluoride water, which has good medical and health benefits, suitable for bathing and medical use. On this basis, an analysis and discussion of the genesis of the geothermal field were conducted, revealing that the geothermal field formed 18,000 to 15,300 years ago. The recharge elevation of the hot water is greater than 2000 meters, with the recharge source from the Hengshan area. The water chemistry type is similar to that of the Daying hot spring water, classified as therapeutic hot mineral water, specifically fluoride water.
EN_ZH: 通过对山西省代县阳明堡地区地热流体的化学成分特征及动态变化、以及同位素地球化学特征的分析，综合总结了地热流体的地球化学特征。发现地下热水中的阳离子主要是Na+，而阴离子主要是Cl-和SO4^2-，热水呈弱碱性、软性和温热。氟化物含量达到命名矿泉水的浓度，因此可以命名为氟水，具有良好的医疗保健效益，适用于沐浴和医疗用途。在此基础上，对地热田的成因进行了分析和讨论，揭示了地热田形成于18000至15300年前。热水的补给高度大于2000米，补给来源于恒山地区。水化学类型与大营温泉水相似，被归类为治疗性热矿水，特别是氟水。

It was found that the cations in the underground hot water are mainly Na+, while the anions are predominantly Cl- and SO42-. ZH_EN: In the third quarter of 2024, the capacity utilization rate of industrial enterprises above the designated size nationwide was 75.1%, a decrease of 0.5 percentage points from the same period last year, and an increase of 0.2 percentage points from the second quarter. abstract: 本文选取了有色金属材料中的典型品种，如铝合金、铜合金、钛及钛合金的化学分析取样标准进行研究，通过对比分析上述典型有色金属的化学成分分析取样标准，并结合产品标准中对取样数量的规定，对取样规定存在的差异性进行研究，并针对有色金属材料化学分析取样标准的现状给出了相关的建议。
ZH_EN: This article selects typical varieties from non-ferrous metal materials, such as aluminum alloys, copper alloys, titanium, and titanium alloys, to study the chemical analysis sampling standards. By comparative analysis of the chemical composition sampling standards of the aforementioned typical non-ferrous metals, and in conjunction with the规定 on sampling quantities in product standards, the differences in sampling regulations are studied. Suggestions are provided regarding the current status of chemical analysis sampling standards for non-ferrous metal materials.
EN_ZH: 本文从有色金属材料中选取了典型品种，如铝合金、铜合金、钛及钛合金，研究其化学分析取样标准。通过对上述典型有色金属的化学成分取样标准进行对比分析，并结合产品标准中对取样数量的规定，研究取样规定的差异。对于有色金属材料化学分析取样标准的现状提出了建议。

abstract: 林业育苗作为林业生产的核心环节，杂草控制对苗木成长至关重要。化学除草技术因高效、便捷而被广泛采用。本文深入剖析了化学除草技术运作机理及其在林业育苗中实用性，并结合当前应用情况，进一步探讨了技术选择标准、操作方式以及对环境影响考量，旨在为林业育苗的杂草管理工作提供科学理论支撑和实践指导，从而确保育苗的高效与安全。
ZH_EN: Forestry seedling cultivation, as a core part of forestry production, relies heavily on weed control for seedling growth. Chemical weeding technology, due to its efficiency and convenience, is widely adopted. This paper deeply analyzes the operational mechanism of chemical weeding technology and its practicality in forestry seedling cultivation. Combining current application scenarios, it further explores the criteria for technology selection, operational methods, and considerations of environmental impact. The aim is to provide scientific theoretical support and practical guidance for weed management in forestry seedling cultivation, ensuring both efficiency and safety in seedling production.
EN_ZH: 林业育苗作为林业生产的核心部分，对幼苗生长的杂草控制依赖性极高。由于其高效和便利，化学除草技术被广泛采用。本文深入分析了化学除草技术的操作机制及其在林业育苗中的实用性。结合当前的应用场景，进一步探讨了技术选择标准、操作方法以及环境影响的考量。目的是为林业育苗的杂草管理提供科学的理论支持和实用的指导，确保育苗生产的效率和安全。

abstract: <正>化学哲学是用哲学思维和方法审视化学学科的本质、性质和发展等方面问题的产物。在化学哲学中,化学是哲学分析的对象;在哲学分类下,化学哲学是科技哲学的一个分支。研究化学哲学不仅是在反思化学的基础和原理,还能够推动化学学科的进步、跨学科的创新,以及科学与社会之间的深度对话。南京师范大学邱道骥教授的《化学哲学概论》是以化学学科为具体研究对象,面向化学专业师生的重要作品。本书从化学的研究对象、研究内容、基本问题出发,深入探讨了化学学科中的基本哲学问题。该书不仅为读者提供了理解化学的全新哲学视角,还对化学在科学哲学中的独特地位做出了详尽的阐释。
ZH_EN: Chemical philosophy is a product of examining the essence, nature, and development of the discipline of chemistry using philosophical thinking and methods. In chemical philosophy, chemistry is the object of philosophical analysis; under the classification of philosophy, chemical philosophy is a branch of the philosophy of science and technology. Studying chemical philosophy not only reflects on the foundations and principles of chemistry but also promotes the progress of the chemical discipline, interdisciplinary innovation, and in-depth dialogue between science and society. Professor Qiu Daoji from Nanjing Normal University's "Introduction to Chemical Philosophy" is an important work aimed at students and teachers in the field of chemistry, taking the discipline of chemistry as its specific subject of study. The book delves into the fundamental philosophical issues within the field of chemistry, starting from the objects of study, the content of research, and the basic problems in chemistry. This book not only provides readers with a new philosophical perspective on understanding chemistry but also offers an exhaustive explanation of chemistry's unique status in the philosophy of science.
EN_ZH: 化学哲学是运用哲学思维和方法，审视化学学科的本质、性质和发展的产物。在化学哲学中，化学是哲学分析的对象；在哲学的分类下，化学哲学是科学与技术哲学的一个分支。研究化学哲学不仅反思化学的基础和原则，还促进化学学科的进步、跨学科创新以及科学与社会之间的深入对话。南京师范大学邱道基教授的《化学哲学导论》是针对化学领域的学生和教师的一部重要著作，以化学学科为具体研究对象。该书深入探讨了化学领域内的基本哲学问题，从研究对象、研究内容和化学的基本问题入手。这本书不仅为读者提供了一个新的哲学视角来理解化学，还对化学在科学哲学中的独特地位进行了详尽的解释。

ZH_EN: The Philosophy of Chemistry is a product of examining the essence, nature, and development of the discipline of chemistry through philosophical thinking and methods. In the philosophy of chemistry, chemistry itself is the subject of philosophical analysis; under the classification of philosophy, the philosophy of chemistry is a branch of the philosophy of science. Studying the philosophy of chemistry not only involves reflecting on the foundations and principles of chemistry but also promotes the advancement of the discipline, interdisciplinary innovation, and in-depth dialogue between science and society. Professor Qiu Daoxi from Nanjing Normal University's "Introduction to the Philosophy of Chemistry" is an important work aimed at chemistry professionals and students, taking the discipline of chemistry as its specific subject of study. The book starts from the objects of study, the content of research, and the fundamental issues of chemistry, delving deeply into the basic philosophical problems within the field of chemistry. It not only provides readers with a new philosophical perspective on understanding chemistry but also offers an exhaustive interpretation of chemistry's unique position in the philosophy of science.

abstract: 如今互联网的应用已经不再局限在计算机端，随着科技的不断发展，移动互联平台已成为主流，学生可以通过移动端进行线上线下的学习互动，学习更加便捷。将移动互联平台应用在高中化学教学中，可以让课堂教学模式更加高效，也让学生在互联网技术的支持下加深对化学知识的了解，让化学学习变得更加直观、生动、有趣。
ZH_EN: The application of the internet is no longer limited to computers; with the continuous development of technology, mobile internet platforms have become mainstream. Students can engage in online and offline learning interactions through mobile devices, making learning more convenient. Applying mobile internet platforms in high school chemistry education can make classroom teaching more efficient, and with the support of internet technology, students can deepen their understanding of chemical knowledge, making chemistry learning more intuitive, vivid, and interesting.
EN_ZH: 互联网的应用已不再局限于电脑；随着技术的持续发展，移动互联网平台已成为主流。学生可以通过移动设备进行在线和离线学习互动，使学习更加便捷。将移动互联网平台应用于高中化学教育中可以使课堂教学更加高效，并在互联网技术的支持下，学生可以加深对化学知识的理解，使化学学习更加直观、生动和有趣。

abstract: 为了推进新课标改革，在中学化学教学中，要将信息技术与中学化学教学相结合，这样能使课堂变得有趣，满足学生个性化发展需求，建设有效的课堂。信息技术改变了原有的教学模式，教师借助信息技术的多种手段实施课堂教学，使教学环境和课堂结构得到充实和优化，突破教学重难点，促进学生深度学习，发展学生的核心素养，提升学生的自主学习能力和教师的教学效率。因此，在数字化时代背景下，化学教师要强化信息技术和学科教学的结合和运用，打造素养化课堂，充分发挥信息技术在教学中的价值。
ZH_EN: To promote the reform of the new curriculum standards, in secondary school chemistry education, it is essential to integrate information technology with chemistry teaching. This approach can make the classroom more engaging, meet the personalized development needs of students, and build an effective classroom. Information technology has transformed the traditional teaching model. Teachers utilize various means of information technology to conduct classroom teaching, enriching and optimizing the teaching environment and classroom structure, overcoming key and difficult teaching points, promoting deep learning among students, developing students' core competencies, enhancing students' independent learning abilities, and improving teachers' teaching efficiency. Therefore, in the context of the digital era, chemistry teachers must strengthen the integration and application of information technology with subject teaching, creating a competency-based classroom, and fully leveraging the value of information technology in education.

abstract: <正>化学知识具有实验性、微观性、抽象性特征，传统讲授方式学生难以理解，易产生反感情绪。短视频集图文、影音、动画于一体，并凭借直观、动态、趣味等优点，为高中化学教学提供了有益补充。短视频在高中化学教学中的应用有重要意义。教师要重视短视频的应用，更新观念，转变教法，充分发挥短视频的辅助教学最大功用，提升教学效益。一、短视频助力高中化学教学的意义（一）变被动听讲为主动学习高中化学课堂知识点多、琐碎、理论性强，学习难度大。如果教师单纯地讲授，学生就处于被动学习的状态，难免分心走神，影响课堂教学效率。
ZH_EN:
Chemistry knowledge has characteristics of experimentation, microscopic nature, and abstraction, making it difficult for students to understand through traditional teaching methods, often leading to negative emotions. Short videos integrate graphics, audio-visual elements, and animations, and with their advantages of being intuitive, dynamic, and entertaining, they provide a beneficial supplement to high school chemistry education. The application of short videos in high school chemistry teaching is of significant importance. Teachers should value the use of short videos, update their concepts, change their teaching methods, and fully leverage the maximum utility of short videos as an auxiliary teaching tool to enhance teaching effectiveness.

**I. The Significance of Short Videos in Aiding High School Chemistry Teaching**

**(1) Transforming Passive Listening into Active Learning**

High school chemistry classrooms are filled with numerous, fragmented, and theoretical knowledge points, making learning challenging. If teachers only lecture, students are in a passive learning state, which inevitably leads to distraction and affects classroom teaching efficiency.

**一、短视频在辅助高中化学教学中的意义**

**(1) 将被动听讲转变为主动学习**

高中化学课堂充满了众多、零散和理论性的知识点，使得学习变得困难。如果教师只是讲授，学生处于被动学习状态，这不可避免地会导致分心，影响课堂教学效率。

abstract: 文章针对当前创新创业教育与有机化学教学的现状，提出了一系列改革策略，旨在融合创新创业教育理念，提升学生的创新思维和实践能力。通过优化课程内容，引入真实情境和项目式学习，鼓励学生主动探究，培养解决实际问题的能力。同时，改革强调团队协作与跨学科交流，以增强学生的综合素质。教学方法上，采用翻转课堂与混合式教学，激发学生学习兴趣，提高教学效果。改革后的教学评价体系兼顾知识掌握与创新能力，通过形成性评价和展示性评价，全方位评估学生的学习进步。通过案例研究和对比分析，展示了改革在提升学生有机化学知识理解、创新思维培养及创业能力方面所取得的显著成效。未来，将持续探索有机化学教学与创新创业教育的深度融合，以期为高等教育改革提供借鉴。
ZH_EN: The article addresses the current state of innovation and entrepreneurship education and organic chemistry teaching, proposing a series of reform strategies aimed at integrating the concepts of innovation and entrepreneurship education to enhance students' innovative thinking and practical abilities. By optimizing course content, introducing real-life scenarios, and project-based learning, students are encouraged to explore proactively and develop problem-solving skills. Additionally, the reform emphasizes teamwork and interdisciplinary communication to enhance students' overall qualities. In terms of teaching methods, flipped classrooms and blended learning are adopted to spark students' interest in learning and improve teaching effectiveness. The reformed teaching evaluation system considers both knowledge acquisition and innovation capabilities, utilizing formative and demonstrative assessments to comprehensively evaluate students' learning progress. Through case studies and comparative analysis, the reforms have shown significant effectiveness in improving students' understanding of organic chemistry, fostering innovative thinking, and enhancing entrepreneurial skills. In the future, there will be continued exploration of the deep integration of organic chemistry teaching with innovation and entrepreneurship education, aiming to provide insights for higher education reform.

Moving forward, there will be a continued exploration of the deep integration of organic chemistry teaching with innovation and entrepreneurship education, aiming to provide insights for higher education reform.
EN_ZH: 文章讨论了当前创新创业教育和有机化学教学现状，提出了一系列改革策略，旨在将创新创业教育理念融入课程，以增强学生的创新思维和实践能力。通过优化课程内容，引入现实场景和项目化学习，鼓励学生主动探索并发展解决问题的能力。同时，改革强调团队合作和跨学科交流，以提升学生的综合素质。在教学方法上，采用翻转课堂和混合式学习来激发学生的学习兴趣，提高教学效果。改革后的教学评价体系既考虑知识的掌握情况，也评估创新能力，通过形成性和展示性评价评估学生的学习进展。通过案例研究和比较分析，改革在增强学生对有机化学的理解、培养创新思维和发展创业技能方面取得了显著成果。未来，将继续探索有机化学教学与创新创业教育的深度融合，为高等教育改革提供见解。

abstract: <正>在当代科技与工业发展中，精确与高效的化学分析方法是基础和关键。分析化学作为科学研究的重要分支，方法精确性直接影响到材料科学、生物医药、环境监测等多个领域的研究成果与工业生产的质量控制。随着信息化技术的不断发展，信息化分析系统在分析化学中的应用已从简单的数据处理扩展到整个分析流程的管理与优化。
ZH_EN: In contemporary science and industrial development, precise and efficient analytical methods in chemistry are fundamental and crucial. Analytical chemistry, as a significant branch of scientific research, directly impacts the research outcomes in fields like materials science, biomedicine, environmental monitoring, and quality control in industrial production through the accuracy of its methods. With the ongoing advancement of information technology, the application of information systems in analytical chemistry has expanded from simple data processing to the management and optimization of the entire analytical process.

abstract: <正>《化学工程与装备》是国家新闻出版署批准出版,公开发行的化工类学术期刊,已被中国学术期刊综合评价数据库(CAJCED)、中国期刊全文数据库(CJFD)收录。本刊由福建石油化工集团有限责任公司主管、福建省化学工业科学技术研究所主办,于1972年创刊,月刊,每月25日出刊。

The journal is supervised by Fujian Petrochemical Group Co., Ltd. and sponsored by the Fujian Provincial Institute of Chemical Industry Science and Technology. It was first published in 1972 and is a monthly publication, released on the 25th of each month.

abstract: 随着互联网的应用普及和教育信息化的持续推进，网络教学资源的应用愈发广泛，为教学活动的改革创新做出了重要贡献。而在初中化学教学中，网络教学资源的应用能够开阔学生思维、转换教师的教学理念，为后续初中化学的高效开展提供助力。基于此，本文对初中化学网络教学资源的应用进行研究，对网络资源在探究新知、实验及复习等课程环节中的应用进行探讨，以期充分发挥网络教学资源的作用，促进学生化学核心素养的有效发展。
ZH_EN: With the widespread application of the internet and the ongoing advancement of educational informatization, the use of online teaching resources has become increasingly prevalent, making significant contributions to the reform and innovation of teaching activities. In junior high school chemistry education, the application of online teaching resources can broaden students' thinking, shift teachers' teaching concepts, and provide support for the effective implementation of junior high school chemistry. Based on this, this paper studies the application of online teaching resources in junior high school chemistry, exploring their use in stages such as exploring new knowledge, experiments, and review, with the aim of fully leveraging the role of online teaching resources to promote the effective development of students' core chemical literacy.
EN_ZH: 随着互联网的广泛应用和教育信息化的持续推进，在线教学资源的使用变得越来越普遍，对教学活动的改革和创新做出了重要贡献。在初中化学教育中，应用在线教学资源可以拓宽学生的思维，改变教师的教学观念，为初中化学课程的有效实施提供支持。基于此，本文研究了在线教学资源在初中化学中的应用，探索其在探索新知识、实验和复习等阶段的使用，旨在充分发挥在线教学资源的作用，促进学生核心化学素养的有效发展。

abstract: <正>在立德树人的教育根本宗旨下，国家大力支持高校充分挖掘与利用红色文化资源，以培养德智体美劳全面发展的社会主义接班人。高校化学专业要对学生开展党史教育活动，培养他们的红色文化意识，让红色文化扎根于学生心田，使他们能够从中汲取精神营养，从而获得良好的思想品质、树立正确的价值观念。
ZH_EN: Under the fundamental educational goal of fostering virtue and nurturing people, the state strongly supports universities in fully tapping into and utilizing red cultural resources to cultivate well-rounded socialist successors in morality, intelligence, physical fitness, aesthetics, and labor. The chemistry department of universities should conduct educational activities on the history of the Communist Party for students, fostering their awareness of red culture, allowing red culture to take root in their hearts, enabling them to draw spiritual nourishment from it, thereby developing good ideological qualities and establishing correct values.
EN_ZH: 在培养德才兼备的教育根本目标下，国家大力支持高校充分挖掘和利用红色文化资源，培养在道德、智力、体质、审美和劳动方面全面发展的社会主义接班人。高校化学系应对学生开展中共党史教育活动，增强他们的红色文化意识，让红色文化在他们心中扎根，使他们从中汲取精神养分，从而培养良好的思想品质，树立正确的价值观。

abstract: <正>为了进一步提升高中化学课堂教学质量,部分授课者逐渐开始丰富该课程的授课体系,探索多样化教学方法在课堂上的运用效果,力求为学生带来更丰富的学习体验。《真实情境下素养为本的高中化学教学策略》一书主要讲述了多种教学方法在高中化学教学课堂中的运用效果,详细列举了情景教学法运用于该课程教学活动中的益处。在传统高中化学教学课堂上,授课者通常采用灌输式教学模式完成课程的授课活动,在面对面的教学过程中为求学者讲解相应的化学知识内容,通过这种教学模式的开展虽然能够有效加深求学者对知识的熟悉程度,但却不利于求学者学习兴趣的提升,为了进一步提升求学者在课堂上与授课者的互动频率,授课者需要革新当下的教学体系,构建多层次授课模式,联合运用多种教学方式优化当下的教学方式,增加课堂的趣味性,提高求学者的学习欲望。
ZH_EN: To further enhance the quality of high school chemistry classroom teaching, some instructors are gradually enriching the teaching system of the course, exploring the application effects of various teaching methods in the classroom, striving to provide students with a richer learning experience. The book "Teaching Strategies for High School Chemistry Based on Real-World Contexts and Competency" mainly discusses the effects of various teaching methods in high school chemistry classrooms, detailing the benefits of using situational teaching methods in these educational activities. In traditional high school chemistry classes, instructors typically use a didactic teaching model to deliver the course content, explaining relevant chemical knowledge to students during face-to-face sessions. Although this teaching approach can effectively deepen students' familiarity with the knowledge, it does not facilitate the enhancement of students' learning interest. To increase the interaction frequency between students and instructors in the classroom, instructors need to innovate the current teaching system, build a multi-tiered teaching model, and combine multiple teaching methods to optimize the current teaching approach, thereby increasing classroom enjoyment and boosting students' desire to learn.
EN_ZH: 为进一步提升高中化学课堂教学质量，一些教师逐渐丰富课程的教学体系，探索各种教学方法在课堂中的应用效果，努力为学生提供更丰富的学习体验。书籍《基于真实情境和能力的高中化学教学策略》主要讨论了高中化学课堂中各种教学方法的效果，详细介绍了使用情境教学法在这些教育活动中的益处。在传统的高中化学课堂上，教师通常采用说教式教学模式来传授课程内容，在面对面的教学中向学生解释相关的化学知识。虽然这种教学方法能有效加深学生对知识的熟悉度，但并不利于提升学生的学习兴趣。为了增加课堂中学生与教师的互动频率，教师需要创新现有的教学体系，构建多层次的教学模式，并结合多种教学方法来优化当前的教学方式，从而提高课堂的趣味性，增强学生的学习欲望。

abstract: <正>为了进一步提升高中化学课堂教学质量,部分授课者逐渐开始丰富该课程的授课体系,探索多样化教学方法在课堂上的运用效果,力求为学生带来更丰富的学习体验。《真实情境下素养为本的高中化学教学策略》一书主要讲述了多种教学方法在高中化学教学课堂中的运用效果,详细列举了情景教学法运用于该课程教学活动中的益处。在传统高中化学教学课堂上,授课者通常采用灌输式教学模式完成课程的授课活动,在面对面的教学过程中为求学者讲解相应的化学知识内容,通过这种教学模式的开展虽然能够有效加深求学者对知识的熟悉程度,但却不利于求学者学习兴趣的提升,为了进一步提升求学者在课堂上与授课者的互动频率,授课者需要革新当下的教学体系,构建多层次授课模式,联合运用多种教学方式优化当下的教学方式,增加课堂的趣味性,提高求学者的学习欲望。
ZH_EN: To further enhance the quality of high school chemistry classroom teaching, some instructors are gradually enriching the teaching system of the course, exploring the application effects of diverse teaching methods in the classroom, striving to provide students with a richer learning experience. The book "Teaching Strategies for High School Chemistry Based on Real-World Contexts" mainly discusses the application effects of various teaching methods in high school chemistry classrooms and details the benefits of using scenario-based teaching methods in these teaching activities. In traditional high school chemistry classrooms, instructors typically use a灌输式 teaching model to deliver the course content, explaining relevant chemical knowledge to learners during face-to-face teaching. Although this teaching model can effectively deepen learners' familiarity with the knowledge, it does not help in increasing learners' interest in learning. To further increase the interaction frequency between learners and instructors in the classroom, instructors need to innovate the current teaching system, construct a multi-level teaching model, and combine various teaching methods to optimize the current teaching approach, adding fun to the classroom and boosting learners' desire to learn.

abstract: <正>近年来，生物基化学纤维及原料产业快速发展，关键技术不断突破，产品品种日益丰富，正在进入新质发展的新赛道。在此背景下，9月25日，2024年中国化学纤维工业协会生物基化学纤维及原料分会年会在安徽合肥召开。会议介绍了2024年我国生物基化学纤维及原料的发展，针对企业普遍存在的问题探讨解决办法，并对下一步发展提出了规划和方向。中国化学纤维工业协会生物基化学纤维及原料分会秘书处杨菲菲介绍了产业发展情况、分会2024开展的工作以及未来计划。
ZH_EN: In recent years, the bio-based chemical fiber and raw material industry has developed rapidly, with continuous breakthroughs in key technologies, and an increasingly diverse range of products, entering a new track of qualitative development. Against this backdrop, on September 25, 2024, the Bio-Based Chemical Fibers and Raw Materials Branch of the China National Textile and Apparel Council held its annual meeting in Hefei, Anhui. The meeting introduced the development of bio-based chemical fibers and raw materials in China in 2024, explored solutions to common problems faced by enterprises, and outlined plans and directions for future development. Yang Feifei, from the secretariat of the Bio-Based Chemical Fibers and Raw Materials Branch of the China National Textile and Apparel Council, presented the industry development status, the work carried out by the branch in 2024, and future plans.
EN_ZH: 近年来，生化基化学纤维和原料产业发展迅速，关键技术不断突破，产品种类日益丰富，进入了质的飞跃新阶段。在此背景下，2024年9月25日，中国国家纺织服装理事会生化基化学纤维和原料分会于安徽合肥召开了年度会议。会议介绍了2024年中国生化基化学纤维和原料的发展，探讨了企业面临的共性问题解决方案，并规划了未来的发展方向和计划。中国国家纺织服装理事会生化基化学纤维和原料分会秘书处杨菲菲介绍了行业发展现状、分会在2024年开展的工作及未来的计划。

abstract: <正>在新时代的背景下，教育不仅是知识的传递，更是价值观的塑造和传播。随着“思政课”概念的不断深入人心，将思想政治教育融入专业课程已成为教学改革的一个重要方向。《有机化学课程思政案例》一书探讨了有机化学与思政教育相结合的创新路径，不仅有助于提升学生的专业素养，还能培养他们的社会责任感和历史使命感，从而实现全方位人才培养的目标。
ZH_EN: In the context of the new era, education is not only about imparting knowledge but also about shaping and disseminating values. As the concept of "ideological and political theory course" becomes increasingly ingrained, integrating ideological and political education into professional courses has become a significant direction for educational reform. The book "Case Study on Ideological and Political Education in Organic Chemistry Courses" explores innovative approaches to combining organic chemistry with ideological and political education, not only enhancing students' professional competence but also fostering their sense of social responsibility and historical mission, thereby achieving the goal of all-around talent development.
EN_ZH: 在新时代的背景下，教育不仅是传授知识，更在于塑造和传播价值观。随着“思想政治理论课”这一概念日益深入人心，将思想政治教育融入专业课程已成为教育改革的一个重要方向。《有机化学课程中思想政治教育案例研究》一书探索了将有机化学与思想政治教育相结合的创新方法，不仅提升了学生的专业能力，还培养了他们的社会责任感和历史使命感，从而实现了全方位人才培养的目标。

abstract: <正>足球是世界上第一大运动，足球运动员的体能素质直接影响到训练成效和比赛结果，而且在运动过程中，运动员的体能消耗非常大，须采用合适的手段提升足球运动员的体能素质。随着运动生物化学学科的发展，科研人员发现采用科学、有效的营养措施，能够很好地提升足球运动员的体能素质，提高其训练效率和比赛成绩。一、足球运动及其供能特点（一）足球运动足球是一项技能主导类同场竞技性运动，在场上需要运动员之间的密切配合，运动时间长、体力消耗也比较大。其主要有以下几个特点：1.耐力性。足球比赛时长为90 min，运动员需要保持高强度的跑动。2.灵敏性。运动员要根据赛场上的情况作出适当的调整，比如攻防转换、守门员扑救等，所以需要拥有较强的观察能力和位移能力。3.爆发性。要想突破对手、抢断球以及射门，往往需要运动员拥有足够强的爆发力。
ZH_EN:
Soccer is the world's number one sport, and the physical fitness of soccer players directly affects training effectiveness and match outcomes. During the sport, athletes consume a significant amount of energy, necessitating the use of appropriate methods to enhance their physical fitness. With the development of the discipline of sports biochemistry, researchers have found that scientific and effective nutritional strategies can significantly improve the physical fitness of soccer players, enhance their training efficiency, and improve their performance in competitions.

I. Soccer and Its Energy Supply Characteristics
(1) Soccer
Soccer is a skill-dominated competitive sport that requires close cooperation among players on the field, with long periods of activity and substantial physical exertion. It has the following main characteristics:
1. **Endurance**: A soccer match lasts for 90 minutes, requiring players to maintain high-intensity running.
2. **Agility**: Players need to make appropriate adjustments based on the situation on the field, such as switching between offense and defense, or goalkeepers making saves, thus requiring strong observational and movement capabilities.
3. **Explosiveness**: To break through opponents, intercept the ball, or shoot, players often need to possess sufficient explosive power.
EN_ZH:
足球是世界上第一运动，足球运动员的身体素质直接影响训练效果和比赛结果。在运动过程中，运动员消耗大量能量，因此需要采用适当的方法来增强其体能。随着运动生物化学学科的发展，研究者发现科学有效的营养策略可以显著提高足球运动员的身体素质，提升训练效率，并改善比赛表现。

一、足球及其能量供应特性
（1）足球
足球是一项以技能为主导的竞技运动，要求场上队员紧密配合，活动时间长，体力消耗大。其主要特点如下：
1. **耐力**：一场足球比赛持续90分钟，运动员需要保持高强度的跑动。
2. **敏捷性**：运动员需要根据场上情况作出适当调整，如进攻和防守的转换，或门将扑救，因此需要强大的观察和移动能力。
3. **爆发力**：为了突破对手、拦截球或射门，运动员常常需要具备足够的爆发力。

ZH_EN:
Football is the world's number one sport, and the physical fitness of football players directly affects training effectiveness and match outcomes. During the sport, athletes consume a significant amount of energy, necessitating appropriate methods to enhance their physical fitness. With the development of exercise biochemistry, researchers have found that scientific and effective nutritional measures can significantly improve the physical fitness of football players, enhancing their training efficiency and match performance.

**I. Football and Its Energy Supply Characteristics**

**(A) Football**

Football is a skill-dominated competitive sport that requires close cooperation among players on the field, with long durations of play and considerable physical exertion. It has the following main characteristics:

1. **Endurance.** Football matches last for 90 minutes, requiring players to maintain high-intensity running.

2. **Agility.** Players need to make appropriate adjustments based on the game situation, such as switching between offense and defense, or goalkeepers making saves, thus requiring strong observational and movement capabilities.

3. **Explosiveness.** To break through opponents, intercept the ball, and shoot, players often need to possess sufficient explosive power.

abstract: 本文阐述了构建关键词触发式课程思政教学模式的必要性，从思政元素梳理和挖掘及再融入、关键词的深入挖掘分类构建成网、模式评价等五方面，以《动物生物化学》为例详细说明了关键词触发式课程思政教学模式的构建过程，同时指出了关键词触发式课程思政教学模式有待发展的不足之处。
ZH_EN: This article discusses the necessity of constructing a keyword-triggered ideological and political teaching model for courses. It details the process using the example of "Animal Biochemistry" from five aspects: the sorting and extraction of ideological elements, the in-depth classification and networking of keywords, and model evaluation. It also points out the areas where the keyword-triggered teaching model needs further development.

abstract: 化学除油器作为一种水处理设备，在钢铁及石油化工行业得到了广泛的应用。文章根据高速棒材生产线轧钢废水处理水质要求，结合项目实际情况，通过对比化学除油与稀土磁盘两种废水处理工艺可知，在水质效果稳定性方面，化学除油器工艺比稀土磁盘稳定，增效的办法更多，且处理效果更好。同时，在节省建设用地、降低一次性投资费用方面都有较大的优势。文章根据工艺要求提出了化学除油器设备的设计方案，论述了化学除油器工艺流程、工作原理、药剂投加特点与应用，以期为相关行业发展提供参考。
ZH_EN: The chemical degreaser, as a water treatment equipment, has been widely applied in the steel and petrochemical industries. According to the water quality requirements for wastewater treatment in high-speed bar production lines, and combining with the actual situation of the project, the article compares the chemical degreasing and rare earth disk wastewater treatment processes. It shows that in terms of water quality stability, the chemical degreaser process is more stable than the rare earth disk, offering more methods to enhance efficiency and achieving better treatment results. Additionally, it has significant advantages in saving construction land and reducing initial investment costs. The article proposes a design scheme for the chemical degreaser equipment based on process requirements, discusses the chemical degreaser process, operating principles, characteristics of chemical dosing, and its applications, aiming to provide a reference for the development of related industries.
EN_ZH: 化学脱脂剂作为水处理设备，已广泛应用于钢铁和石化行业。根据高速棒材生产线废水处理的水质要求，并结合项目实际情况，文章对比了化学脱脂和稀土盘废水处理工艺。结果显示，在水质稳定性方面，化学脱脂剂工艺比稀土盘更稳定，提供了更多的提高效率的方法，并取得了更好的处理效果。此外，它在节约建设用地和降低初期投资成本方面具有显著优势。文章基于工艺要求，提出了化学脱脂剂设备的设计方案，讨论了化学脱脂过程、操作原理、化学加药的特性及其应用，旨在为相关行业的发展提供参考。

abstract: <正>立足“新工科”专业教育场域,物理化学实验能力是化学、材料、生物、环保等专业人才的一项基本素养,在学科设置上,具备一定的前置条件,通常应在系统学习分析化学实验的基本原理与操作规范的基础上,以及熟悉常规实验工具、仪器、方法之后,再进入的物理化学实验领域。基于教学主体视角,物理化学实验的基本内涵是运用物理学知识、技术、经验及规律去解决化学问题,这意味着单个物理化学实验项目有着复合属性,所涉及的教学理论与实践过程也更为丰富、复杂。
ZH_EN: Focusing on the educational context of "New Engineering" majors, physical chemistry experimental skills are a fundamental quality for professionals in fields such as chemistry, materials science, biology, and environmental protection. In terms of curriculum design, there are certain prerequisites; typically, students should first systematically study the basic principles and operational norms of analytical chemistry experiments, become familiar with conventional experimental tools, instruments, and methods, before entering the realm of physical chemistry experiments. From the perspective of teaching subjects, the core essence of physical chemistry experiments is to apply physics knowledge, technology, experience, and laws to address chemical issues. This implies that individual physical chemistry experiment projects have composite attributes, involving teaching theories and practical processes that are more diverse and complex.
EN_ZH: 聚焦于“新工科”专业的教育背景，物理化学实验技能是化学、材料科学、生物学和环境保护等领域专业人士的基本素质。在课程设计方面，有一定的先决条件；通常，学生应首先系统地学习分析化学实验的基本原理和操作规范，熟悉常规的实验工具、仪器和方法，然后再进入物理化学实验领域。从教学学科的角度来看，物理化学实验的核心本质是应用物理学知识、技术、经验和规律来解决化学问题。这意味着单个物理化学实验项目具有综合属性，涉及的教学理论和实践过程更加多样和复杂。

From the perspective of the teaching subject, the core essence of physical chemistry experiments is to apply knowledge, techniques, experience, and laws of physics to solve chemical problems. This implies that individual physical chemistry experimental projects have composite attributes, and the involved teaching theories and practical processes are richer and more complex.
EN_ZH: 基于“新工科”专业教育背景，物理化学实验能力是化学、材料科学、生物学、环境保护等领域专业人士的基本素质。在课程设计方面，有一定的先修要求；通常应系统了解分析化学实验的基本原理和操作规范，并熟悉常规实验工具、仪器和方法，才能进入物理化学实验领域。从教学主体的角度来看，物理化学实验的核心本质是应用物理知识、技术、经验和规律来解决化学问题。这意味着单个物理化学实验项目具有复合属性，所涉及的教学理论和实践过程更加丰富和复杂。

abstract: 思政教育资源与高中化学课程的深度融合可提升学生的科学探究能力，增强其社会责任感和环境保护意识。但在课程思政视域下，当前部分学校的高中化学教学仍存在思政元素融入不足，教学定位较模糊；思政教学形式单一，化学探究创新受限；教学评价存在偏差，缺失综合素养评估等问题。对此，教师可采取如下教学策略：深挖化学思政元素，促进学生科学精神养成；创新实验教学设计，帮助学生实践课程思政理念；建设思政评价机制，关注学生全面发展，以此推动高中化学课程教学在学科教育与思政教育的协同发展。
ZH_EN: The deep integration of ideological and political education resources with high school chemistry courses can enhance students' scientific inquiry abilities, strengthen their sense of social responsibility, and raise their awareness of environmental protection. However, under the perspective of ideological and political education in courses, there are still issues in some high schools' chemistry teaching, such as insufficient integration of ideological and political elements, unclear teaching orientation; monotonous forms of ideological and political education, limited innovation in chemical inquiry; biases in teaching evaluation, and the lack of comprehensive quality assessment. In response, teachers can adopt the following teaching strategies: delve into the ideological and political elements of chemistry to foster students' scientific spirit; innovate experimental teaching designs to help students practice the ideological and political concepts of the course; establish an evaluation mechanism for ideological and political education, focusing on the overall development of students, thereby promoting the coordinated development of high school chemistry teaching in both disciplinary education and ideological and political education.
EN_ZH: 高中化学课程与思想政治教育资源的深度融合，可以增强学生的科学探究能力，加强他们的社会责任感，并提高他们对环境保护的意识。然而，在课程的思想政治教育视角下，一些高中的化学教学仍存在问题，如思想政治元素的融合不足、教学导向不明确；思想政治教育形式单一，化学探究创新有限；教学评价存在偏差，缺乏综合素质评估。对此，教师可以采取以下教学策略：深入挖掘化学的思想政治元素，培养学生的科学精神；创新实验教学设计，帮助学生实践课程中的思想政治观念；建立思想政治教育的评价机制，关注学生的全面发展，从而促进高中化学教学在学科教育和思想政治教育方面的协调发展。

ZH_EN: The deep integration of ideological and political education resources with high school chemistry courses can enhance students' scientific inquiry abilities, strengthen their sense of social responsibility, and increase their environmental awareness. However, under the perspective of ideological and political education in courses, there are still issues in some high schools where the integration of ideological and political elements is insufficient, the teaching objectives are somewhat vague; the forms of ideological and political teaching are monotonous, limiting chemical inquiry and innovation; and there are biases in teaching evaluations, lacking comprehensive competency assessments. In response, teachers can adopt the following teaching strategies: delve into the ideological and political elements of chemistry to foster students' scientific spirit; innovate in experimental teaching designs to help students practice the concepts of ideological and political education; and establish an evaluation system for ideological and political education, focusing on the holistic development of students, thereby promoting the coordinated development of subject education and ideological and political education in high school chemistry courses.

EN_ZH: 思想政治教育资源与高中化学课程的深度融合，可以增强学生的科学探究能力，加强他们的社会责任感，提高他们的环境意识。然而，在课程中的思想政治教育视角下，一些高中仍然存在以下问题：思想政治元素的融合不足，教学目标模糊；思想教育形式单一，限制了化学的探索与创新；教学评价存在偏见，缺乏综合素质评估。为此，教师可以采取以下教学策略：深入挖掘化学中的思想元素，培养学生的科学精神；创新实验教学设计，帮助学生实践课程的思想观念；建立以学生全面发展为核心的思想评价体系，从而促进高中化学教学中学科教育与思想教育的协同发展。

abstract: 科技的迅猛发展，尤其是计算机和网络技术的普及，使传统物理化学教学面临着新的挑战，如何将计算化学融入物理化学教学中，成了当前教育改革的重要课题。文章旨在探讨计算化学在物理化学教学中的应用，并提出计算化学在物理化学教学中应用的挑战与展望，以提高学生的学科兴趣和学术表现。研究表明，借助分子模拟、量子化学计算等方法，学生可以更深入地理解反应热力学、反应动力学等抽象概念；利用科研反哺教学、增设上机环节等方式，可以激发学生创新潜力，培养学生的科研思维。
ZH_EN: The rapid development of technology, especially the popularization of computer and network technology, presents new challenges for traditional physical chemistry education. How to integrate computational chemistry into physical chemistry teaching has become a significant topic in current educational reform. This article aims to explore the application of computational chemistry in physical chemistry teaching and discusses the challenges and prospects of applying computational chemistry in physical chemistry education to enhance students' interest and academic performance. Research shows that through methods like molecular simulation and quantum chemistry calculations, students can gain a deeper understanding of abstract concepts such as reaction thermodynamics and kinetics. By incorporating research into teaching and adding computer lab sessions, students' innovative potential can be stimulated, and their research thinking can be cultivated.
EN_ZH: 技术的飞速发展，尤其是计算机和网络技术的普及，为传统的物理化学教育带来了新的挑战。如何将计算化学整合到物理化学教学中已成为当前教育改革的一个重要话题。本文旨在探讨计算化学在物理化学教学中的应用，并讨论在物理化学教育中应用计算化学面临的挑战和前景，以增强学生的兴趣和学业表现。研究表明，通过分子模拟和量子化学计算等方法，学生可以更深入地理解反应热力学和动力学等抽象概念。通过将研究融入教学并增加计算机实验课，可以激发学生的创新潜能，培养他们的研究思维。

abstract: 科技的迅猛发展，尤其是计算机和网络技术的普及，使传统物理化学教学面临着新的挑战，如何将计算化学融入物理化学教学中，成了当前教育改革的重要课题。文章旨在探讨计算化学在物理化学教学中的应用，并提出计算化学在物理化学教学中应用的挑战与展望，以提高学生的学科兴趣和学术表现。研究表明，借助分子模拟、量子化学计算等方法，学生可以更深入地理解反应热力学、反应动力学等抽象概念；利用科研反哺教学、增设上机环节等方式，可以激发学生创新潜力，培养学生的科研思维。
ZH_EN: The rapid development of technology, especially the popularization of computer and network technology, has brought new challenges to traditional physical chemistry education. How to integrate computational chemistry into physical chemistry teaching has become a crucial topic in current educational reform. This article aims to explore the application of computational chemistry in physical chemistry education and discuss the challenges and prospects of applying computational chemistry in teaching to enhance students' interest in the subject and academic performance. Studies show that with the help of molecular simulations, quantum chemical calculations, and other methods, students can gain a deeper understanding of abstract concepts such as reaction thermodynamics and kinetics; employing research to inform teaching, adding computer lab sessions, and other methods can stimulate students' innovative potential and cultivate their research thinking.

abstract: 文章以上饶师范学院为例，首先阐述了化学师范生工匠精神的内涵，然后分析了化学师范生工匠精神培育与师范专业认证的内在联系，接着论述了师范专业认证背景下化学师范生工匠精神培育的意义，之后提出了师范专业认证背景下化学师范生工匠精神培育的路径，最后总结了师范专业认证背景下化学师范生工匠精神培育的成效，其中路径包括进行顶层设计，把工匠精神融入化学师范专业人才培养方案；开展榜样宣传，把工匠精神融入榜样模范引领；推进教学改革，把工匠精神融入课堂教学和实训实践。
ZH_EN: Taking Shangrao Normal College as an example, the article first explains the connotation of the craftsman spirit among chemistry normal students, then analyzes the intrinsic connection between the cultivation of the craftsman spirit and the accreditation of normal education programs. It then discusses the significance of cultivating the craftsman spirit among chemistry normal students under the background of normal education program accreditation. Subsequently, it proposes pathways for cultivating the craftsman spirit among chemistry normal students under this accreditation background, and finally summarizes the achievements of this cultivation. The pathways include conducting top-level design by integrating the craftsman spirit into the talent training program for chemistry normal education; promoting role models by integrating the craftsman spirit into exemplary leadership; and advancing teaching reforms by incorporating the craftsman spirit into classroom teaching and practical training.
EN_ZH: 以上饶师范学院为例，文章首先阐述了化学师范生工匠精神的内涵，然后分析了工匠精神培养与师范教育专业认证之间的内在联系。其后，讨论了在师范教育专业认证背景下培养化学师范生工匠精神的重要性。接着，提出了在该认证背景下培养化学师范生工匠精神的路径，最后总结了这一培养的成果。这些路径包括通过将工匠精神融入化学师范教育的人才培养方案进行顶层设计；通过将工匠精神融入榜样引领来推广典型；以及通过将工匠精神融入课堂教学和实践训练来推进教学改革。

The pathways include: implementing top-level design by integrating the craftsman spirit into the talent development plan for chemistry education majors; promoting role model publicity by integrating the craftsman spirit into the leadership of exemplary figures; and advancing teaching reform by integrating the craftsman spirit into classroom teaching and practical training.

abstract: 化学分析检测是一项复杂性任务，涉及众多可能的干扰变量。为确保化学分析检测得到令人满意的结果，必须在检测分析前进行有效的质量管理，化学分析仪器的计量检测是其中不可或缺的一部分。文章详细阐释了化学分析仪器管理及计量检测过程中的不足之处，并提供了针对性的改善方案，旨在确保化学制品计量检测结果的可信度。
ZH_EN: Chemical analysis testing is a complex task involving numerous potential interfering variables. To ensure satisfactory results, effective quality management must be conducted before the analysis. Metrological testing of chemical analysis instruments is an indispensable part of this process. The article elaborately explains the deficiencies in the management and metrological testing of chemical analysis instruments and provides targeted improvement solutions, aiming to ensure the credibility of the results in chemical metrological testing.

abstract: 挖掘天然药物化学课程中蕴含的思想政治教育资源，将思政教育与专业知识教学有机融合，有助于培养具备专业技能，创新能力和强烈社会责任感的药学人才。本文概述了天然药物化学课程的基本情况，以树立专业自信、文化自信；引导守正创新，把握科学发展的内涵；传递家国情怀，助力学生凝聚奋进力量3个方面阐释了天然药物化学课程思政建设的案例设计和教学探索。
ZH_EN: The mining of ideological and political education resources embedded in the course of natural medicinal chemistry, integrating ideological education with professional knowledge teaching, helps cultivate pharmaceutical talents with professional skills, innovative capabilities, and a strong sense of social responsibility. This paper outlines the basic situation of the natural medicinal chemistry course, with three aspects: establishing professional confidence and cultural confidence; guiding integrity and innovation, grasping the connotation of scientific development; conveying patriotic feelings to help students gather strength for progress, explaining the case design and teaching exploration of ideological and political construction in the natural medicinal chemistry course.

abstract: 在人类的生产生活中，化学工程和化学工艺占据着重要的地位，为推动工业建设和经济发展做出了重大贡献。但工业文明的进程难免会对环境造成影响。为了解决这一问题并完成化学工程中的环保绿色目标，我国的各个化工企业开始积极研究绿色化工技术在化学工程和工艺中的实际应用。基于此，阐述了绿色化工技术的内容和重要性，以及绿色化工技术的开发和具体应用。
ZH_EN: In human production and life, chemical engineering and chemical processes play a significant role, making substantial contributions to industrial construction and economic development. However, the progress of industrial civilization inevitably impacts the environment. To address this issue and achieve the environmental and green objectives in chemical engineering, various chemical companies in China have started actively researching the practical application of green chemical technology in chemical engineering and processes. Based on this, the content and importance of green chemical technology, as well as its development and specific applications, are discussed.
EN_ZH: 在人类生产和生活中，化学工程和化学过程发挥着重要作用，对工业建设和经济发展做出了重大贡献。然而，工业文明的进步不可避免地影响环境。为了解决这个问题并实现化学工程中的环境和绿色目标，中国的各大化学公司已开始积极研究绿色化学技术在化学工程和工艺中的实际应用。基于此，讨论了绿色化学技术的内容和重要性，以及其发展和具体应用。

abstract: <正>东南大学化学化工学院前身是原中央大学重要的院系之一，最早于1920年成立了化学系，1928年成立了化学工程系，1988年恢复建立化学化工系，2006年成立化学化工学院。学院现拥有“化学工程与技术”和“化学”一级学科博士点，“化学”和“化学工程与技术”一级学科硕士点，另有“材料物理和化学”二级博士点和硕士点，其中“应用化学”和“新材料”学科为江苏省优势学科，并建有“化学工程与技术”博士后科研流动站。学院现设有化学系、化学工程系、化学生物与制药工程系三个系，先后设立了精细化工研究所、制药工程研究所，拥有江苏省分子铁电科学与应用重点实验室、江苏省生物药物高技术研究重点实验室、江苏省光电功能材料工程实验室、江苏省富碳材料与器件工程实验室等。学院设有教学实验中心，并同楼宇共享校级分析测试中心设备资源，为教学科研提供了优越的实验条件。学院现有教职工（含全职博士后、专职科研）136名，其中专任教师103名，98%
ZH_EN: The School of Chemistry and Chemical Engineering at Southeast University was originally one of the key departments of the former Central University. The Department of Chemistry was established in 1920, the Department of Chemical Engineering in 1928, the Department of Chemistry and Chemical Engineering was re-established in 1988, and the School of Chemistry and Chemical Engineering was founded in 2006. The school currently has doctoral programs in the primary disciplines of "Chemical Engineering and Technology" and "Chemistry," as well as master's programs in these disciplines. It also has secondary doctoral and master's programs in "Materials Physics and Chemistry." Among these, "Applied Chemistry" and "New Materials" are key disciplines in Jiangsu Province, and a postdoctoral research station in "Chemical Engineering and Technology" has been established. The school has three departments: Chemistry, Chemical Engineering, and Chemical Biology and Pharmaceutical Engineering. It has also established the Institute of Fine Chemicals, the Institute of Pharmaceutical Engineering, and hosts key laboratories such as the Jiangsu Provincial Key Laboratory of Molecular Ferroelectrics Science and Applications, the Jiangsu Provincial Key Laboratory of High-Tech Research on Biomedicine, the Jiangsu Provincial Engineering Laboratory of Optoelectronic Functional Materials, and the Jiangsu Provincial Engineering Laboratory of Carbon-Rich Materials and Devices. The school has a teaching experiment center and shares equipment resources with the university-level analysis and testing center, providing excellent experimental conditions for teaching and research. EN_ZH: 东南大学化学化工学院最初是原中央大学的重点院系之一。化学系成立于1920年，化工系成立于1928年，化学与化工系于1988年重新设立，化学化工学院于2006年成立。学院目前设有“化学工程与技术”和“化学”两个一级学科博士点，以及这些学科的硕士点。还设有“材料物理与化学”的二级博士和硕士点。在这些学科中，“应用化学”和“新材料”是江苏省重点学科，并设有“化学工程与技术”博士后科研流动站。学院下设化学系、化工系、化学生物与药物工程系，并成立了精细化学研究所、制药工程研究所，并设有江苏省分子铁电材料科学与应用重点实验室、江苏省生物医学高技术研究重点实验室、江苏省光电子功能材料工程实验室、江苏省富碳材料与器件工程实验室等重点实验室。学院还设有教学实验中心，并与学校级分析测试中心共享设备资源，为教学和科研提供优良的实验条件。目前，学院有136名教职工（包括专职博士后和专职研究人员），其中专职教师103人，98%的教师拥有博士学位。

EN_ZH: 东南大学化学与化工学院最初是原中央大学的重点院系之一。化学系成立于1920年，化工系成立于1928年，化学与化工系于1988年重建，化学与化工学院于2006年成立。学院目前拥有“化学工程与技术”和“化学”一级学科博士点，以及“化学”和“化学工程与技术”硕士点。此外，还设有“材料物理与化学”二级学科博士点和硕士点。其中，“应用化学”和“新材料”是江苏省重点学科。学院还设有“化学工程与技术”博士后科研流动站。学院由化学系、化工系和生物化工与药物工程系组成，并设立了精细化工研究所和药物工程研究所，拥有江苏省分子铁电科学与应用重点实验室、江苏省生物医学高技术重点实验室、江苏省光电功能材料工程实验室和江苏省富碳材料与器件工程实验室。学院拥有一个教学实验中心，并与校级分析测试中心共享同一大楼的设备资源，为教学和科研提供了优越的实验条件。目前，学院共有员工136名（包括专职博士后和专职科研人员），其中专任教师103名，98%的教师拥有博士学位。

abstract: 随着科技的发展和社会的进步，化学类专业作为自然科学的重要组成部分，在国民经济和社会发展中扮演着不可替代的角色。然而，当前高校化学类大学生就业现状面临着一系列挑战。本文以某大学为研究对象，结合问卷调查结果和新时期就业市场的实际情况，总结归纳了化学类大学生就业现状，并基于现状提出助力其就业的可行对策，期望本文研究能为高校化学类专业就业指导服务的优化提供更多参考依据。
ZH_EN: With the advancement of science and technology and the progress of society, chemistry majors, as an important component of natural sciences, play an indispensable role in the national economy and social development. abstract: 近年来，随着我国社会信息技术持续发展，其应用逐渐渗透至人们的日常生活与工作中，显著提升了人们生活的便利性并有效促进了工作效率的提升。在信息技术迅猛发展的背景下，教师在实施教学活动过程中应当与时俱进，紧跟信息时代的发展潮流，巧妙运用先进信息技术为学生设计教学内容与活动。基于此，在初中化学课堂教学中，教师适当地融入信息技术，有助于构建更加高效的化学课堂学习环境，对提升学生的化学水平与能力具有重要的意义和深远的影响。
ZH_EN: In recent years, with the continuous development of social information technology in China, its application has gradually penetrated into people's daily lives and work, significantly enhancing the convenience of life and effectively boosting work efficiency. In the context of the rapid development of information technology, teachers should keep pace with the times during the implementation of teaching activities, closely follow the trends of the information age, and skillfully use advanced information technology to design teaching content and activities for students. Based on this, incorporating information technology appropriately in middle school chemistry classroom teaching helps to construct a more efficient learning environment for chemistry classes, which is of great significance and has a profound impact on improving students' chemistry skills and abilities.

abstract: 目的 本研究旨在评估化学发光法（CLIA）在临床肿瘤标志物检测中的灵敏度与特异性，尤其是在早期肿瘤筛查中的应用效果。方法 选取2024年3月至6月期间A医院体检中心的1246例血清样本，分析AFP、CEA、CA-125、CA-199等肿瘤标志物的化学发光法检测结果。通过与临床诊断结果对比，评估其灵敏度、特异性及预测值（PPV和NPV）。数据采用SPSS 26.0软件进行统计分析，用卡方检验、t检验等方法进行组间比较。结果 化学发光法检测结果表明，CA-125的灵敏度最高（89.5%）,AFP和CA-199的灵敏度分别为80.3%和85.7%,CEA灵敏度最低（68.5%）。在特异性方面，CEA表现最佳（95.8%）,AFP、CA-199和CA-125的特异性分别为92.4%、90.3%和88.2%。不同肿瘤标志物在肝癌、卵巢癌、胃癌和结直肠癌中的灵敏度表现存在显著差异（P <0.05）。结论 化学发光法在肿瘤标志物的检测中具有高灵敏度和高特异性，能够为肿瘤的早期诊断提供重要的支持。不同标志物在不同肿瘤类型中的表现存在差异，临床应根据肿瘤类型选择合适的标志物进行联合检测，以提高早期诊断的准确性。
ZH_EN:
**Objective** This study aims to evaluate the sensitivity and specificity of chemiluminescence immunoassay (CLIA) in clinical tumor marker detection, particularly its application in early tumor screening.

**Methods** Serum samples from 1,246 individuals at Hospital A's physical examination center from March to June 2024 were selected to analyze the CLIA detection results of tumor markers such as AFP, CEA, CA-125, and CA-199. The sensitivity, specificity, and predictive values (PPV and NPV) were assessed by comparing the results with clinical diagnoses. Data were statistically analyzed using SPSS 26.0 software, with group comparisons made using chi-square tests, t-tests, etc.

**Results** The CLIA results showed that CA-125 had the highest sensitivity (89.5%), followed by AFP and CA-199 with sensitivities of 80.3% and 85.7% respectively, while CEA had the lowest sensitivity (68.5%). In terms of specificity, CEA performed the best (95.8%), with AFP, CA-199, and CA-125 having specificities of 92.4%, 90.3%, and 88.2% respectively. There were significant differences in the sensitivity of different tumor markers in liver, ovarian, gastric, and colorectal cancers (P < 0.05).

**Conclusion** CLIA demonstrates high sensitivity and specificity in the detection of tumor markers, providing important support for early tumor diagnosis. The performance of different markers varies across different types of tumors, suggesting that clinical practice should select appropriate markers for combined detection based on tumor type to enhance the accuracy of early diagnosis.
EN_ZH:
**目标** 本研究旨在评估化学发光免疫分析法（CLIA）在临床肿瘤标志物检测中的敏感性和特异性，特别是其在早期肿瘤筛查中的应用。

**方法** 选取2024年3月至6月期间，医院A体检中心的1,246名个体血清样本，分析AFP、CEA、CA-125和CA-199等肿瘤标志物的CLIA检测结果。通过与临床诊断结果对比，评估其敏感性、特异性以及预测值（PPV和NPV）。数据使用SPSS 26.0软件进行统计分析，组间比较采用卡方检验、t检验等。

**结果** CLIA结果显示，CA-125的敏感性最高（89.5%），其次是AFP和CA-199，敏感性分别为80.3%和85.7%，而CEA的敏感性最低（68.5%）。在特异性方面，CEA表现最佳（95.8%），AFP、CA-199和CA-125的特异性分别为92.4%、90.3%和88.2%。不同肿瘤标志物在肝癌、卵巢癌、胃癌和结直肠癌中的敏感性存在显著差异（P < 0.05）。

**结论** CLIA在肿瘤标志物检测中表现出高敏感性和特异性，为早期肿瘤诊断提供了重要支持。不同标志物在不同类型的肿瘤中的表现各有不同，建议临床实践根据肿瘤类型选择适当的标志物进行联合检测，以提高早期诊断的准确性。

ZH_EN:
**Objective** This study aims to evaluate the sensitivity and specificity of chemiluminescence immunoassay (CLIA) in the detection of clinical tumor markers, particularly its application in early tumor screening.

**Methods** Serum samples from 1,246 individuals at Hospital A’s health examination center from March to June 2024 were selected. The detection results of tumor markers like AFP, CEA, CA-125, and CA-199 were analyzed using CLIA. By comparing with clinical diagnostic results, the sensitivity, specificity, and predictive values (PPV and NPV) were assessed. Data were statistically analyzed using SPSS 26.0 software, with inter-group comparisons performed using chi-square tests, t-tests, and other methods.

**Results** CLIA results showed that CA-125 had the highest sensitivity at 89.5%, while AFP and CA-199 had sensitivities of 80.3% and 85.7%, respectively. CEA had the lowest sensitivity at 68.5%. In terms of specificity, CEA performed best at 95.8%, followed by AFP, CA-199, and CA-125 at 92.4%, 90.3%, and 88.2% respectively. There were significant differences in the sensitivity of different tumor markers in liver cancer, ovarian cancer, gastric cancer, and colorectal cancer (P <0.05).

**Conclusion** Chemiluminescence immunoassay shows high sensitivity and specificity in detecting tumor markers, providing important support for early tumor diagnosis. The performance of different markers varies with tumor types, and clinical practice should select appropriate markers for combined detection to enhance the accuracy of early diagnosis.

**方法** 选取2024年3月至6月期间A医院健康体检中心的1,246名个体的血清样本。使用CLIA分析AFP、CEA、CA-125和CA-199等肿瘤标志物的检测结果。通过与临床诊断结果对比，评估敏感性、特异性及预测值（PPV和NPV）。数据使用SPSS 26.0软件进行统计分析，组间比较使用卡方检验、t检验等方法。

**结果** CLIA结果显示CA-125的敏感性最高，达89.5%，而AFP和CA-199的敏感性分别为80.3%和85.7%。CEA的敏感性最低，为68.5%。在特异性方面，CEA表现最佳，达95.8%，其次是AFP、CA-199和CA-125，分别为92.4%、90.3%和88.2%。在肝癌、卵巢癌、胃癌和结直肠癌中，不同肿瘤标志物的敏感性存在显著差异（P <0.05）。

**结论** 化学发光免疫分析在检测肿瘤标志物方面表现出高敏感性和特异性，为早期肿瘤诊断提供了重要支持。不同标志物的表现因肿瘤类型而异，临床实践中应选择适当的标志物进行联合检测，以提高早期诊断的准确性。

abstract: 目的 本研究旨在评估化学发光法（CLIA）在临床肿瘤标志物检测中的灵敏度与特异性，尤其是在早期肿瘤筛查中的应用效果。方法 选取2024年3月至6月期间A医院体检中心的1246例血清样本，分析AFP、CEA、CA-125、CA-199等肿瘤标志物的化学发光法检测结果。通过与临床诊断结果对比，评估其灵敏度、特异性及预测值（PPV和NPV）。数据采用SPSS 26.0软件进行统计分析，用卡方检验、t检验等方法进行组间比较。结果 化学发光法检测结果表明，CA-125的灵敏度最高（89.5%）,AFP和CA-199的灵敏度分别为80.3%和85.7%,CEA灵敏度最低（68.5%）。在特异性方面，CEA表现最佳（95.8%）,AFP、CA-199和CA-125的特异性分别为92.4%、90.3%和88.2%。不同肿瘤标志物在肝癌、卵巢癌、胃癌和结直肠癌中的灵敏度表现存在显著差异（P <0.05）。结论 化学发光法在肿瘤标志物的检测中具有高灵敏度和高特异性，能够为肿瘤的早期诊断提供重要的支持。不同标志物在不同肿瘤类型中的表现存在差异，临床应根据肿瘤类型选择合适的标志物进行联合检测，以提高早期诊断的准确性。
ZH_EN:
**Objective** This study aimed to evaluate the sensitivity and specificity of chemiluminescence immunoassay (CLIA) in the clinical detection of tumor markers, particularly its application in early tumor screening.

**Methods** A total of 1246 serum samples from the physical examination center of Hospital A between March and June 2024 were selected. The chemiluminescence assay results for tumor markers such as AFP, CEA, CA-125, and CA-199 were analyzed. The sensitivity, specificity, and predictive values (PPV and NPV) were assessed by comparing with clinical diagnoses. Data were statistically analyzed using SPSS 26.0 software, with comparisons between groups conducted using chi-square and t-tests.

**Results** The chemiluminescence assay results showed that CA-125 had the highest sensitivity (89.5%), with AFP and CA-199 sensitivities at 80.3% and 85.7% respectively, and CEA having the lowest sensitivity (68.5%). In terms of specificity, CEA performed the best (95.8%), followed by AFP, CA-199, and CA-125 at 92.4%, 90.3%, and 88.2% respectively. There were significant differences in the sensitivity of different tumor markers for liver cancer, ovarian cancer, gastric cancer, and colorectal cancer (P <0.05).

**Conclusion** Chemiluminescence immunoassay demonstrates high sensitivity and specificity in the detection of tumor markers, providing significant support for early tumor diagnosis. Different markers show varied performance across different types of tumors, suggesting that clinical selection of appropriate markers for combined detection should be based on tumor type to enhance the accuracy of early diagnosis.
EN_ZH:
**目标** 本研究旨在评估化学发光免疫分析法（CLIA）在肿瘤标志物临床检测中的敏感性和特异性，特别是在早期肿瘤筛查中的应用。

**方法** 选取了2024年3月至6月期间在A医院体检中心的1246例血清样本。分析了肿瘤标志物如AFP、CEA、CA-125和CA-199的化学发光检测结果。通过与临床诊断比较，评估了敏感性、特异性以及预测值（PPV和NPV）。数据使用SPSS 26.0软件进行统计分析，采用卡方检验和t检验进行组间比较。

**结果** 化学发光检测结果显示，CA-125的敏感性最高（89.5%），AFP和CA-199的敏感性分别为80.3%和85.7%，CEA的敏感性最低（68.5%）。在特异性方面，CEA表现最佳（95.8%），其次是AFP、CA-199和CA-125，分别为92.4%、90.3%和88.2%。不同肿瘤标志物对肝癌、卵巢癌、胃癌和结直肠癌的敏感性存在显著差异（P <0.05）。

**结论** 化学发光免疫分析法在肿瘤标志物检测中表现出高敏感性和特异性，为早期肿瘤诊断提供了重要支持。不同标志物在不同类型肿瘤中的表现各异，建议根据肿瘤类型选择合适的标志物进行联合检测，以提高早期诊断的准确性。

abstract: <正>公共场所是人们经常集聚的、供大众使用的综合性社会场所。公共场所主要为公众提供包括住宿、休闲、娱乐、公共交通等生活需求，近年来，伴随着经济社会的快速发展，公共场所类型和数量显著增加。同时，伴随着人们环保意识的增强，人们对于室内空气质量关注度持续提高。旅游酒店作为重要的公共场所，一般人员流动性较高，室内空气质量也会对住客和从业人员健康产生重要的影响。旅游酒店通常空间较为封闭狭小，易受装修材料、装饰装潢中的化学物质的影响，甲醛、氨等污染物可能在空气中累积，进而会对人体健康造成危害。因此，开展旅游酒店公共场所室内空气化学污染物的健康风险评估与治理至关重要。
ZH_EN: Public places are comprehensive social venues frequently visited by people for various public uses. These places mainly provide services such as accommodation, leisure, entertainment, and public transportation to meet the living needs of the public. In recent years, with the rapid development of the economy and society, the types and number of public places have significantly increased. At the same time, with the enhancement of environmental awareness among people, there has been a continuous increase in attention to indoor air quality. As important public venues, tourist hotels generally have high personnel mobility, and indoor air quality significantly affects the health of both guests and staff. Tourist hotels typically have relatively enclosed and cramped spaces, making them susceptible to the influence of chemical substances from renovation materials and decorations. Pollutants like formaldehyde and ammonia might accumulate in the air, potentially causing harm to human health. Therefore, conducting health risk assessments and management of chemical pollutants in the indoor air of tourist hotels is crucial.

abstract: <正>随着科技日新月异的发展，化学术语翻译的重要性日益凸显，研究和探讨翻译策略成为解决这一问题的关键所在。因此，必须重视这一话题，并在应用语言学的支持下，探索适合不同语境和文化背景的翻译方法。《有机化学机理导论（第6版）》的作者是彼得·塞克斯，由王剑波等人翻译，于2018年由北京大学出版社出版,全书包含13个章节，内容涉及基础有机化学的各方面内容，书中介绍的内容显然是为化学专业的学生和研究者设计的，涵盖了有机化学的基础理论、反应机理及各种化学反应的详细分析。译者王剑波是北京大学化学学院的教授，担任本科生基础有机化学课程主讲。该书译者具备很强的学术背景和教学基础，确保了本书的高质量和学术性。这本书的内容涉及有机化学的核心概念和反应机制，尤其关注反应的结构、热力学和动力学方面。
ZH_EN: As technology develops rapidly, the importance of translating chemical terminology is becoming increasingly prominent, making the study and exploration of translation strategies key to addressing this issue. Therefore, it is essential to focus on this topic and, with the support of applied linguistics, explore translation methods suitable for different contexts and cultural backgrounds. The book "Introduction to Organic Chemical Mechanisms (6th Edition)" is authored by Peter Sykes, translated by Wang Jianbo and others, and was published by Peking University Press in 2018. The entire book contains 13 chapters covering various aspects of basic organic chemistry. The content is evidently designed for chemistry students and researchers, covering the basic theories of organic chemistry, reaction mechanisms, and detailed analysis of various chemical reactions. The translator, Wang Jianbo, is a professor at the Department of Chemistry at Peking University and is the main lecturer for undergraduate courses in basic organic chemistry. The translators possess strong academic backgrounds and teaching foundations, ensuring the book's high quality and academic rigor. The content of the book covers the core concepts and reaction mechanisms of organic chemistry, with a particular focus on the structure, thermodynamics, and kinetics of reactions.

EN_ZH: 随着技术发展日新月异，化学术语翻译的重要性日益显现。研究和讨论翻译策略已成为解决这一问题关键。因此，关注这一话题，并在应用语言学的支持下，探索适合不同语境和文化背景的翻译方法是必要的。《有机反应机理导论（第六版）》由Peter Sykes撰写，王建波等人翻译，北京大学出版社于2018年出版，共13章，涵盖了基础有机化学的各个方面。内容显然是为化学学生和研究人员设计的，涵盖了有机化学的基础理论、反应机理以及对各种化学反应的详细分析。译者王建波是北京大学化学学院的教授，负责教授本科基础有机化学课程。翻译者拥有坚实的学术背景和教学基础，确保了书籍的高质量和学术严谨性。该书着重讨论了有机化学的核心概念和反应机理，特别关注反应的结构、热力学和动力学。

abstract: 为认真贯彻落实《国家职业教育改革实施方案》《关于深化产教融合的若干意见》要求，基于产教融合加强对中专化学检验技术专业实践教学体系的构建是一道紧迫且重要的教育课题。文章首先阐述了产教融合背景下中专化学检验技术专业实践教学体系构建的价值，继而提出了教学现状，最后探讨了教学实践路径，包括精准锚定人才培养的宏伟蓝图、精心雕琢课程体系与教学内容、强化实践教学基地的坚实支撑、实施多元化评价体系的全面覆盖等，以此为中专化学检验技术专业培养更多适应市场需求的高素质技术技能人才。
ZH_EN: To earnestly implement the "National Vocational Education Reform Implementation Plan" and the "Several Opinions on Deepening the Integration of Industry and Education", it is an urgent and important educational issue to strengthen the construction of the practical teaching system for the secondary vocational chemical inspection technology major based on the integration of industry and education. The article first elaborates on the value of building the practical teaching system for the secondary vocational chemical inspection technology major under the background of industry-education integration, then discusses the current teaching situation, and finally explores practical teaching paths. These paths include precisely anchoring the grand blueprint for talent cultivation, meticulously crafting the curriculum system and teaching content, strengthening the solid support of practical teaching bases, and implementing a comprehensive coverage of a diversified evaluation system. This aims to cultivate more high-quality technical and skilled talents that meet market demands for the secondary vocational chemical inspection technology major.
EN_ZH: 为切实贯彻落实《国家职业教育改革实施方案》和《关于深化产教融合的若干意见》，加强中职化学检验技术专业基于产教融合的实践教学体系建设，是当前亟待解决的重要教育问题。本文首先阐述了在产教融合背景下，中职化学检验技术专业实践教学体系建设的价值，然后探讨当前的教学现状，最后探索实践教学路径。这些路径包括精准定位人才培养的宏伟蓝图，精心设计课程体系和教学内容，加强实践教学基地的坚实支撑，落实多元评价体系的全面覆盖，旨在培养更多符合市场需求的高素质技术技能人才。

abstract: <正>在当今社会，环境化学与播音主持这两个看似毫无交集的领域，正逐渐展现出融合发展的趋势。随着全球环境问题的日益严峻，环境化学作为一门专注于研究环境污染、治理与保护的学科，其重要性日益凸显。而播音主持作为传媒行业的重要组成部分，承担着信息传递、舆论引导等重要职责。在融媒体环境下，信息的传播方式都发生了深刻变革，这为环境化学与播音主持的融合发展提供了前所未有的机遇。环境化学与播音主持的融合发展不仅具有现实基础，也符合时代发展的趋势。
ZH_EN: In today's society, the fields of environmental chemistry and broadcasting, which seem to have no intersection, are gradually showing a trend of integration and development. With the increasing severity of global environmental issues, environmental chemistry, as a discipline focused on studying environmental pollution, treatment, and protection, is becoming more and more important. Broadcasting, as an essential part of the media industry, plays crucial roles in information dissemination and public opinion guidance. In the context of integrated media, the ways information is communicated have undergone profound changes, providing unprecedented opportunities for the integrated development of environmental chemistry and broadcasting. The integration of environmental chemistry and broadcasting not only has a practical foundation but also aligns with the trends of the times.
EN_ZH: 在当今社会，原本看似毫无交集的环境化学和广播领域，正逐渐展现出融合发展的趋势。随着全球环境问题的日益严重，环境化学作为一门专注于研究环境污染、治理和保护的学科，变得越来越重要。广播作为媒体产业的重要组成部分，在信息传播和舆论引导方面扮演着关键角色。在全媒体融合的背景下，信息传播方式发生了深刻变化，为环境化学与广播的融合发展提供了前所未有的机遇。环境化学与广播的融合不仅具有实际基础，也符合时代潮流。

abstract: 随着土壤污染问题日益加剧，要提高土壤环境的可持续性和经济价值，就必须做好土壤环境的监测工作。而分析化学作为一种有效的土壤环境监测手段，可以准确的监测出污染物的种类、含量和污染程度等，是控制和治理土壤环境污染的重要依据。首先简要分析了我国土壤环境污染现状以及监测活动中分析化学法的优势，随后阐述了土壤监测环境下分析化学的主要方法及应用，提出了优化监测方案、加强监测技术创新和仪器质控、创设土壤环境监测信息平台和控制土壤环境监测质量等应用建议，以期为土壤环境监测中的分析化学应用提供依据和创新方向。
ZH_EN: As soil pollution problems become increasingly severe, to enhance the sustainability and economic value of the soil environment, it is essential to conduct effective soil environmental monitoring. Analytical chemistry, as an effective means of soil environmental monitoring, can accurately detect the types, concentrations, and levels of pollutants, serving as a crucial basis for controlling and managing soil pollution. Firstly, this paper briefly analyzes the current state of soil environmental pollution in China and the advantages of analytical chemistry methods in monitoring activities. Subsequently, it discusses the main methods and applications of analytical chemistry in soil monitoring environments, and proposes recommendations for optimizing monitoring schemes, enhancing monitoring technology innovation and instrument quality control, establishing a soil environmental monitoring information platform, and controlling the quality of soil environmental monitoring, in hopes of providing a basis and direction for innovation in the application of analytical chemistry in soil environmental monitoring.
EN_ZH: 随着土壤污染问题日益严重，为了提高土壤环境的可持续性和经济价值，开展有效的土壤环境监测至关重要。分析化学作为土壤环境监测的有效手段，能够准确检测污染物的类型、浓度和水平，为控制和管理土壤污染提供关键基础。首先，本文简要分析了中国土壤环境污染的现状以及分析化学方法在监测活动中的优势。随后，讨论了分析化学在土壤监测环境中的主要方法和应用，并提出了优化监测方案、提升监测技术创新与仪器质量控制、建立土壤环境监测信息平台、控制土壤环境监测质量等建议，希望为分析化学在土壤环境监测中的应用创新提供基础和方向。

ZH_EN: As soil pollution issues become increasingly severe, to enhance the sustainability and economic value of the soil environment, it is essential to carry out effective soil environmental monitoring. Analytical chemistry, as an effective means of soil environmental monitoring, can accurately detect the types, concentrations, and levels of pollutants, serving as a crucial basis for controlling and treating soil pollution. The paper first briefly analyzes the current state of soil pollution in China and the advantages of analytical chemistry methods in monitoring activities, then discusses the main methods and applications of analytical chemistry in soil monitoring environments. It proposes suggestions for optimizing monitoring schemes, enhancing monitoring technology innovation and instrument quality control, creating a soil environmental monitoring information platform, and controlling the quality of soil environmental monitoring, aiming to provide a basis and innovative direction for the application of analytical chemistry in soil environmental monitoring.
EN_ZH: 随着土壤污染问题日益严重，为了提高土壤环境的可持续性和经济价值，进行有效的土壤环境监测是必不可少的。分析化学作为土壤环境监测的一种有效手段，可以准确检测污染物的种类、浓度和水平，是控制和治理土壤污染的重要基础。本文首先简要分析了中国土壤污染的现状以及分析化学方法在监测活动中的优势，继而讨论了分析化学在土壤监测环境中的主要方法和应用。文章提出了优化监测方案、提升监测技术创新和仪器质量控制、建立土壤环境监测信息平台、以及控制土壤环境监测质量的建议，旨在为分析化学在土壤环境监测中的应用提供基础和创新方向。

These suggestions aim to provide a basis and direction for innovation in the application of analytical chemistry in soil environmental monitoring.
EN_ZH: 随着土壤污染问题不断加剧，深入开展土壤环境监测对于提升土壤环境的可持续性和经济价值至关重要。分析化学作为土壤环境监测的有效手段，能够精确检测污染物的种类、浓度和水平，为控制和管理土壤污染提供关键依据。本文首先简要分析了中国当前的土壤污染状况及分析化学方法在监测活动中的优势。接着，概述了分析化学在土壤监测环境中的主要方法和应用，提出了优化监测方案、提升监测技术创新与仪器质量控制、建立土壤环境监测信息平台及控制土壤环境监测质量的建议。这些建议旨在为分析化学在土壤环境监测中的应用创新提供基础和方向。

abstract: <正>在新媒体时代,高校化学专业大学生的价值观培育面临着前所未有的机遇与挑战。随着移动互联网技术的飞速发展,新媒体以其独特的即时性、共享性和互动性,成为了大学生获取信息、交流思想、构建价值观念的重要平台,这一变化不仅极大地丰富了大学生的信息来源,也深刻地影响着他们的价值观念。在此背景下,高校化学专业大学生的价值观培育显得尤为重要。化学专业作为自然科学的重要组成部分,其学科特点要求学生具备严谨的科学态度、扎实的专业知识以及良好的道德素养。
ZH_EN: In the era of new media, the cultivation of values among university students majoring in chemistry faces unprecedented opportunities and challenges. With the rapid development of mobile internet technology, new media, with its unique immediacy, shareability, and interactivity, has become an important platform for university students to acquire information, exchange ideas, and construct value concepts. This change not only greatly enriches the sources of information for university students but also profoundly influences their value concepts. In this context, the cultivation of values among university students majoring in chemistry becomes particularly important. As an important component of natural science, the discipline of chemistry requires students to have a rigorous scientific attitude, solid professional knowledge, and good moral qualities.

abstract: <正>化学产品在工业设计领域具有十分广泛的应用,涵盖了从材料选择到产品制造的各个方面。化学产品的应用为粘合剂、涂料、塑料、橡胶、纤维素材料和表面处理剂等的优化设计提供了可能,有效改善了产品的物理强度、耐久性、可塑性、透明度等特性,从而满足不同场景的应用需求。因此,深入研究化学产品的特性、应用和创新有助于拓宽工业设计领域的发展空间并满足不断变化的市场需求,为工业领域的发展注入新的活力。
ZH_EN: Chemical products have extensive applications in the field of industrial design, covering aspects from material selection to product manufacturing. The use of chemical products enables the optimization of designs for adhesives, coatings, plastics, rubber, cellulosic materials, and surface treatments, effectively enhancing properties such as physical strength, durability, plasticity, and transparency to meet the needs of various scenarios. Therefore, in-depth research into the characteristics, applications, and innovations of chemical products helps to broaden the development space of industrial design and meet the ever-changing market demands, injecting new vitality into the industrial sector.
EN_ZH: 化学产品在工业设计领域有着广泛的应用，从材料选择到产品制造各个方面都有涉及。使用化学产品可以优化粘合剂、涂层、塑料、橡胶、纤维素材料和表面处理的设计，有效提升物理强度、耐久性、可塑性和透明度等特性，以满足各种场景的需求。因此，深入研究化学产品的特性、应用和创新，有助于拓展工业设计的发展空间，满足不断变化的市场需求，为工业领域注入新的活力。
